subject: Request for payment of overdue commission on GOAFFPRO platform
description_text:
Hello support team. We are your partner on GOAFFPRO platform with email
address: mcburrowsreali963@gmail.com. We are writing this gmail to request
you to complete the late commission payment. We seriously request you to
urgently pay me the commission within 24 hours from the time I sent this
gmail. This is required so that We can continue to bring you many other
potential customers. We have attached a screenshot of the payment. We thank
you.
[image: image.png]

conversations.body_text: Hi Oanh,  Hello, no need to worry. We will have the operations team organize the invoices and make the payment to you along with others as soon as possible.

Thank you. Our Paypal is having problems receiving payments. Please pay via
our new Paypal email: minhquanvu0710@gmail.com. Thank you very much.


Vào Th 7, 22 thg 11, 2025 lúc 10:28 service@simsonn.com
